txt.en: Further into the ruins of Caranost you find more Orcs. In order to assist the Free Peoples, you must continue to drive them out and reach the top of the stairs at Caranost.
'Fighting on steps is too dangerous for me. I am glad you kept your footing. Let us return to the camp.'
Reach the small encampment at the top of Caranost's stairs
You have reached the top of Caranost's stairs

Precarious steps lead up into Caranost. There upon are Orcs who mean to throw you from the ruin into the arms of the slavering allies below. Fight through their number and clear the steps of their threat.
